EmailTemplate.description: Blank template used for Support to send emails to customers that a Non DI Parent Case has been resolved.
EmailTemplate.name: Dealer Issue Resolved Template.
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.CaseNumber} -VinSolutions has resolved your issue
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
The issue reported below has been resolved.
{!Case.Subject}
If you have any other issues or concerns please reach out to our technical support team.
Sincerely, VinSolutions Support Team Support@vinsolutions.com 1-800-980-7488
